widesha rakiyawaka nirathawa meratata paminena shri lankikayan wisin upayagath mudal ho wisheshitha danuma nisi paridi aayojanaya kirima menma upaya gath mudal merata rajya ha paudgalika bankuwala nisiparidi aayojanaya kirime awasthawa salasa dimath mehi aramunak bawa sabhapathiwaraya sandahan keleya.mema shramikayin nawatha liyapadinchi kirimen pasuwa ema siyalu daththa shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshayehi web adawiyata athulath karana athara ema thorathuru osse shramikayange palapurudda merata sewa aayathanawalata labadimata karyanshaya apeksha karayi.widesha rakiyawanhi nirathawa sita meratata pamini shramikayin nawatha liyapadinchi kirima shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaye siyaluma palath karyala ha disthrik karyalawaladi sidukere.

namuth mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma koti thrasthawadaya paradawa ratama eka sesath kirime prathipalayak lesa me sundara wana uyane akkara laksha 3 purama gos eya narambaimata obata dan awasthawa labi thibenawa.me yali wiwrutha kirime uthsawayedi amathiwaraya awadharanaya kale dan me rata siyalu jathika wanodyana janathawata narambaima sandaha wiwrutha wi athi bawayi.merata wishalathama jathika wana uyana wilpaththuwa parisarika ha swabhawika sampath amathi patali champika ranawaka mahatha athin wiwrutha wu awasthawamehidi apata hamuwu wanajiwi sanrakshana departhamenthuwe wayambaa palath wanajiwi niyojya adhyaksha wayi.pi.ji.karunarathna mahatha pawasuwe perawaru 6 sita sawasa 6 dakwa wilpaththuwa jathika udyanaya mahajanathawata wiwrutha wi pawathina bawayi.
